long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OnlyKey is a device taking aim at the password problem. OnlyKey removes the hassle of remembering passwords and serves as a universal two-factor authentication platform that can replace multiple hardware tokens and apps.

The OnlyKey Configuration Chrome App is to be used along with an OnlyKey device (classic or the new DUO). The Chrome app can be used for initial setup of your OnlyKey as well as updating firmware and configuration of usernames, passwords, two-factor authentication, crypto keys (ECC, RSA, and PGP), backup and restoration, and setting preferences on your OnlyKey.
